inclusion.criterion: 16,660 people will be selected through simple randomization without replacement
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: be selected within clusters defined by basic healthcare area, primary care (PC) centre or doctor's office
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The participants of the selected intervention group will be informed of the study objectives and the diagnostic tests
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A minimum 10-year follow-up period has been established to observe the onset of CV events
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The following variables will be recorded: weight, height, waist circumference and neck circumference
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Blood pressure will be measured 3 times (Omron 6) at 2-min intervals and the mean of the last 2 will be collected
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Dried capillary blood testing (fingertip puncture) will be used to determine creatinine, uric acid and total cholesterol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The examination and reading will be performed by 2 nurses specialized in vascular imaging diagnostics
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The VIVID I version BT12 ultrasound system (GE Healthcare) will be used
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The DICOM network connectivity system will be used to record the results and ultrasound images online in the e-CAP
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CKD progression is defined as a doubling of creatinine or entry into renal replacement therapy, and will also be collected through the e-CAP
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The onset of a CV event will be recorded according to the 10th version of the International Statistical Classification of Diseases (ICD-10)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior medical history of cardiovascular disease.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a family history of CAD, but no other cardiovascular risk factors such as smoking, high blood pressure, and diabetes mellitus. He has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery (LICA) and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery (RICA).
